Summary: saw bright star light object float across the sky. no pulsing lights no wings looked like the brightest star in the sky
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brook Park
There were no other sightings in Brook Park on or around August 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI came home from the store and looked up in the sky as I always do on clear nights and noticed the brightest star in the sky. As I watched it for a few seconds it started to move. It flew across the whole sky in less the a minute and flickered out. I taped it on my iphone but it was dark and u can just see a bright light slowly moving.
